Policy.policyDescription: The following Privacy Policy sets forth the terms under which information provided by its users is used and protected when using its website. This website was created for academic purposes, and we are committed to the security of user data. When you are asked to fill in personal information fields by which you can be identified, it is done so with the assurance that it will only be used in accordance with the terms of this document. By registering an account, you accept the terms outlined herein.
Policy.policyInfoDescription: The website may collect personal information such as your name, contact information like your email address, and demographic information, including phone numbers. Additionally, specific information may be requested when necessary to process an order, make a delivery, or handle billing.
Policy.policyInfoUsageDescription: The website uses the information solely for demonstration of its functionality, particularly to maintain a record of users, orders if applicable, and to improve the services. Emails will never be sent for advertising purposes; they will only be used as a password recovery method. These emails will be sent to the address you provide and can be canceled at any time. We are highly committed to fulfilling the commitment to keeping your information secure. We use the most advanced systems and continuously update them to ensure that there is no unauthorized access.
Policy.policyCookiesDescription1: A cookie refers to a file that is sent with the purpose of requesting permission to be stored on your computer. By accepting this file, a cookie is created, which is then used to gather information regarding web traffic. Another function of cookies is that websites can recognize you individually through them, thus providing you with the best personalized service on their website.
Policy.policyCookiesDescription2: The website will not use cookies to identify the pages that are visited and their frequency. This information, on other websites, is used solely for statistical analysis, and the information is permanently deleted afterward. You can delete cookies from your computer at any time. However, cookies help provide a better service from websites. They do not give access to your computer's information or to you unless you want to provide it directly. You can accept or decline the use of cookies; however, most browsers automatically accept cookies as they help provide a better web service. You can also change your computer settings to decline cookies. If you decline cookies, you may not be able to use some of our services.
Policy.policyThirdPartyDescription: This website will not have links to other sites that may be of interest to you. Once you leave the page, we will no longer have control over the site to which you are redirected, and therefore, we will not be responsible for the terms or privacy or the protection of your data on those other third-party sites. Such sites are subject to their own privacy policies, so it is advisable to consult them to confirm that you agree with them.
Policy.policyPersonalInfoDescription1: At any time, you can restrict the collection or use of the personal information that is provided to our website. Whenever you are asked to fill out a form, such as the user registration form, you can check or uncheck the option to receive information by email. You can cancel at any time.
Policy.policyPersonalInfoDescription2: This website will not sell, transfer, or distribute the personal information that is collected without your consent, unless required by a court with a court order.
Policy.policyCredits: These terms and conditions have been generated using plantillaterminosycondicionestiendaonline
